feature_model.name: CFDP Library

meta.data: Feature Model of the CFDP library
PReCISE Research Centre, Faculty of Computer Science, University of Namur
Arnaud Hubaux, Andreas Classen and Patrick Heymans, Formal Modelling of Feature Configuration Workflows, SPLC 2009, San Francisco, USA.

feature_model.feature_tree: :r CFDP Library(_r) :g (_r_1) [1,*] : Send(_r_1_2) :o Send Acknowledged Mode(_r_1_2_3) :o Send File System Operations(_r_1_2_4) : Receive(_r_1_5) :o Receive Acknowledged Mode(_r_1_5_6) :o Receive File System Operations(_r_1_5_7) : PUS(_r_1_8) :o PUS Rename(_r_1_8_9) :o PUS Copy(_r_1_8_10) : Reboot_(_r_1_11) :o Reboot Entity(_r_1_11_12) :o Reboot PUS(_r_1_11_14)
